NPC.name: Dragomech
NPC.description: Standing twice your height at the shoulder this quadrepedal synth has the general outline of a saurian or flightless dragon. Powerful alloy claws grip the ground and broad paws support the mech and its black synth flesh is sheathed in strategic armour plating including a strip of articulated armour running up from the snout, past glowing red optics and all the way down the warmachines spine to its tail. The shoulders of the mech seem to contain ordinance launch hatches that can only increase the air of uncompromising and confident lethality the dragomech exudes.
